brief_title: Telephone Enhancement Procedure for Continuing Care - 1
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test a feasibility study of a telephone enhancement procedure (TELE) to improve participation in continuing care activities.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Residential substance abuse treatment patients who reside within the pre-specified catchment area who complete continuing care plans prior to discharge. - Voluntary admit to residential treatment center; substance abuse or dependence; reside in targeted counties; and may be reached by telephone.
